name: Rachel Rays Turkey Chimichangas
ingredients: 1 lb. smoked turkey, chopped (I use deli turkey mesquite is good have them sliced thick)
instructions: Put turkey in bowl with chili powder.
Mix cabbage, chipotles, tomato sauce and green onions.
Put cheese near 1 edge of tortilla.
Tuck sides up and roll tightly.
Brush wraps with oil and bake 15-20 minutes at  400.
